title: Ep 209: Blind Sex (Ft. C-Note)
itunes:title: Ep 209: Blind Sex (Ft. C-Note)
description:
This week the girls are joined by a visually impaired man named C-Note.

He shares details about his sex and dating life while being blind for the past 10 years… and shares very interesting details of his life.

Questions like these are answered:

What do you think we look like??

Tell us about how you use dating apps now

Do you watch porn and if so…. What part of it gets you off?


Follow the hosts on social media

Twitter @whoreiblepod
